tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE training_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  distance FLOAT,
  pace FLOAT,
  duration TIME
)

CREATE TABLE daily_workouts (
  workout_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_id UUID,
  workout_date DATE,
  distance DECIMAL,
  pace DECIMAL,
  duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE training_plans (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  distance FLOAT,
  pace VARCHAR(50),
  duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE workouts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_id INT,
  day DATE,
  distance FLOAT,
  pace VARCHAR(50),
  duration TIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES training_plans(id)
);

CREATE TABLE daily_distance (
  distance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  day DATE,
  distance DECIMAL(10, 2),
  plan_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES training_plans(plan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE daily_pace (
  pace_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  day DATE,
  pace DECIMAL(5, 2),
  distance_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (distance_id) REFERENCES daily_distance(distance_id)
);

CREATE TABLE workout_duration (
  duration_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  day DATE,
  duration INTERVAL,
  pace_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (pace_id) REFERENCES daily_pace(pace_id)
);
